what you will get: instant download step by step pattern with loads of clear photos and a print friendly pattern.

what you will crochet: a mini blanket referred to as a lovey, attached to an amigurumi soft toy. every child should get a chance to love one.

finished size: each lovey blanket is 30cm x 30cm (12"x 12"), with an amigurumi head and arms attached to one corner.

crochet skill: easy to confident beginner. the pattern has helpful hints along the way which are highlighted.

what you need: +/- 250g 4 ply sport (i used 100% bamboo eco-friendly yarn), the right hook size for your yarn (i used a 2.5 mm hook). some stuffing, sewing needle, stitch marker and scissors. if you use thicker yarn than me your lovey blanket might be too big for a baby, so remember that when choosing your yarn.

notes: i use us crochet terms. if making for babies/small children remember safety first.
